allow: Bash(python -c "import pytmx; from pytmx.util_pygame import load_pygame; tmx = load_pygame(''assets/levels/level2.tmx''); print(''TMX loaded successfully!''); print(f''Size: {tmx.width}x{tmx.height} tiles''); print(f''Tile size: {tmx.tilewidth}x{tmx.tileheight}''); print(f''Layers: {[layer.name for layer in tmx.visible_layers]}'')")
